text:
It looks like a Java bug on the particular implementation you use.
I don't reproduce issue with an Oracle Java 8u112 for example on Mac OSX.

Did you try with an Oracle JVM ?
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
dbrakeley@proletariat.com
text:
I just installed the Oracle JVM 1.8.0_121, and that appears to have fixed it. Thanks for the help, I searched a bunch before submitting this bug, but I couldn't find anyone having a similar problem. Probably most people have a more recent version of java.

For anyone else who encounters this, I just did this:

$ sudo add-apt-repository ppa:webupd8team/java
$ sudo apt update
$ sudo apt install oracle-java8-installer

It was ~174MiB of downloads, and it set the new version as my default java version.
